title: Flowly, VR-enabled app to manage chronic pain and stress, rolls out program for providers

title: Flowly App Helps Reduce Coronavirus Stress and Anxiety; Pledges Support for COVID-19 Relief Efforts
body: LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Flowly, the mobile app for pain and anxiety management, today announced new offerings to help people cope with Coronavirus-related stress and anxiety, while pledging ...
